text: @realDonaldTrump Hey dumbass. You want a ton of people to gather together screaming verbal diarrhea for a few hours while the coronavirus is still hanging around all over.. Now as much as i hate you and dislike the sad sad people that support you, i dont wish them sick or dead. Just cancel plz.
